entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
